body.p: Following are the various controls displayed during an ongoing meeting. Click any of these controls to access it:

ul.li: — Click this icon to leave an ongoing meeting. The other participants will continue to be active in the meeting.
— Click this icon alternately to turn on or turn off your camera.
— Click this icon alternately to mute or unmute your mic.
— Click this icon alternately to start or stop screen sharing during a meeting.
— Click this icon to invite more users to an ongoing meeting.
— Click this icon to open the Settings menu.
— Click this icon to switch to Active Talker mode.
— During Active Talker mode, click this icon to switch to User Tiles mode (shown in the image).
— Click this icon to toggle on or toggle off the chat window. All the chat messages during a meeting can be viewed in the chat window.
— Click this icon to view the URL of the meeting, the dial-in number, and the meeting ID.

— This icon appears in the User Tile of users encountering issues with the network or an outage during the call. The audio and video communication with these users might be affected during this time. This icon will disappear when the connection with these users is properly re-established.

— A registered user will see this prompt during an ongoing meeting to accept or reject the guest users in the Waiting Room into the meeting. Click Accept All to allow these users into the meeting. Click Decline All to prevent these users from joining the meeting. To accept or decline specific users, click the icon or the icon beside their names.

body.p: In addition to the various controls mentioned above, there are controls that are displayed on hovering over the User Tile.

p.note: These controls are displayed only when you join a meeting as a Registered User.

li.p: — Hover over a User Tile and click the icon to mute that user.
Remove— Hover over a User Tile. The icon is displayed at the top right corner of the tile. Click the icon and click Remove to remove that user from the meeting.
